meaningMnemonic: Who is going to <kanji>accompany</kanji> the <kanji>judge</kanji> in deciding the results of the trial? The <vocabulary>jury</vocabulary>! They're the only other people besides the judge who can decide someone's fate in court.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
